articles.title: Experimental mRNA Vaccine Could Limit the Impact of Avian Flu Outbreaks - Technology Networks

articles.description: A helicopter, carrying 7, made an emergency landing due to a technical fault, approximately 100 metres away from the Kedarnath helipad.
articles.content:
All the 6 passengers and the pilot are safe.

articles.title: Alphabet, Meta Offer Millions to Partner With Hollywood on AI - Bloomberg
